name: Endless Runner (Bertug Vatansever)
description:
My first game that I have just developed is now available. This game's genre is 'endless runner' as understood from its actual name. There are two playable characters which you can change in main menu. One of them is Ninja which has double jump skill and normal amount of health, other one is Warrior Woman, when you choose this character you will be able to fight more bravely with 2x health. Note: This is my my first game, there might be some issues should be fixed. Please be aware of that and help each other to improve!

Controls 

Movements : AD

Jump : Space or LMB

Heavyjump : Hold Space or LMB

Attack : RMB
